channel.title: 3D Crosshair and Nvidia laser sight not working
channel.description:
This game is marvellous in 3D with Nvidia 3d Vision, but only downside is the crosshair is 2D and the Nvidia laser sight doesn't show up when activated. Is there any way to enable the native 3d crosshair in BMS, like it is in L4d2 and TF2, or can the nvidia laser sight be forced on somehow?
Thanks.
